ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: fail to test & upload attachment to S3
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Steps To Reproduce** **1. Fail to test** 1. Go to App Store and configure S3 2. Click Test 3. It shows "Successfully tested plugin settings" 4. Go to S3 bucket. No test images are uploaded. **2. Fail to upload attachment** 1. Create a table with a column with an attachment type 2. Upload an image 3. It shows "Cannot read property 'data' of undefined" **Expected behavior** 1. Test images should be uploaded to target S3. If there is a connection issue, users should know it from the return message. 2. Attachments should be able to uploaded to target S3. Node: **v12.22.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.9.37**
